Text.Page:
(This document bears a single, glowing rune, one you remember seeing in Highwatch, adorning the armor of someone named Tarkloon.)

- Accepting this quest will destroy this document.

This is extraordinary! Where did you find a knowledge rune? Ancient amani craftsmen used these to record their most powerful designs. My family has translated these for generations, allowing smiths to apply these designs to modern weapons and armor.

With your permission, I'd like to examine the document...

As I suspected...you've got something really rare there. If your skills are sufficient to the task, you will soon be able to craft some truly remarkable things.

Here: I have translated the document so that you can upgrade your equipment. I look forward to seeing the results of your labor!
